This is a FFmpeg Win32 shared build made to be LGPLv2+ compliant.

FFmpeg version: 2.8.12
  libavutil      54. 31.100
  libavcodec     56. 60.100
  libavformat    56. 40.101
  libavdevice    56.  4.100
  libavfilter     5. 40.101
  libswscale      3.  1.101
  libswresample   1.  2.101

This FFmpeg build was configured with:
  --disable-static
  --enable-shared
  --disable-w32threads

The source code for this FFmpeg build can be found at: <https://www.ffmpeg.org/download.html>

This build was compiled on Debian stretch/stable (64-bit): <http://www.debian.org/>

GCC 6.3.0 was used to compile this FFmpeg build: <http://gcc.gnu.org/>

This build was compiled using the MinGW-w64 toolchain: <http://mingw-w64.sourceforge.net/>
